title: Tenticle Pet
description:
Greetings earthling! You are among the fortunate few of your world who get to receive their very own Tentacle Pet! That's right, a tentacle monster that will attend you whenever you wish!

Why you ask? Because we breed and sell tentacle monsters to buyers across the multiverse. We noticed your universe has a complete lack of tentacle monsters, at least ones that fuck people. So this is an excellent oportunity for the both of us!

In exchange for a free Tentacle Pet, all we ask is that you serve as an example. We want people to look at you and say "Hey, they look really happy with a Tentacle Pet. I should get one too!"

So, because of the fact that you're getting a Pet for free rather than buying one, we've setup a points system for you. Some options will give you points, but most of them will cost points.

You start with 30 Points

Even after customizing and receiving your pet, the options don't end there. Your pet has various 'settings' which can be modified at any time, using your handy-dandy Pet Phone which you'll receive along with your pet.

You'll be able to customize things like its personality and libidio, enable/disable any perks which you have purchased, or modify settings that those purchases unlock.
author: Whoop

contains.title: Default Perks
contains.description: These are free perks that come standard with every Tentacle Pet.

contains.title: Self Cleaning
contains.description:
A Tentacle Pet's slimy body will prevent it from gathering any germs or detritus from touching the ground.

Additionally, its cum will automatically evaporate after a while. You can adjust how long it lingers.

contains.title: Loyal
contains.description:
Your pet will obey every order you give it, so long as it understands, and you keep it happy.

Your pet will never attempt to harm a living being.

Most pets will not rape anyone. Though if they're starving or unhappy they might do so.

contains.title: Sex Diet
contains.description:
Tentacle Pets feed off of a mixture of their own orgasms, and the orgasms of other beings.

To keep your pet healthy and happy the both of you should orgasm at least 3 times a day.

You can mod your pet to cum at the same time you do.

contains.title: Tough & Strong
contains.description:
Tentacle monsters are notoriously difficult to kill, as they possess incredible durability and regenerative properties. They'll live forever if not killed.

They are also strong enough to lift and bind humans effortlessly for extremely long periods of time.

contains.title: Personal Modifications
contains.description: Okay, so one slight problem is that your body is woefully inadequate to handle hot tentacle sex. So with your permission, we'll drug you, teleport you to our genetics lab, and modify your body to be far better than before. Which will provide you with these free perks.

Stage one of improving your body is fixing all of the inefficient crap. Your body now reconstructs cells perfectly.
Or in other words, etemal youth, pretty sweet huh?

On top of that, your body will now maintain its shape. So exercise is 100% unnecessary.

Don't have the 'equipment' you want? Easy fix. We can modify your gender however you wish. Male, female, both?

While we're at it, we can completely re-do your appearance however you want, even add on some wierd parts.

contains.title: Endurance

Also removes refractory periods, and period periods. Because fuck those honestly.

Allows you to toggle your fertility if you ever fuck another person.

Yes I included having children in the 'waste' category.

contains.title: Intelligence
contains.description: How smart is your pet? Choose one option.

After 5 hours of sex, built in tranquilizers will knock it out for the remainder of the day.

This pet is driven by instinct. It'll initiate sex whenever it gets hungry, regardless of consent. It can understand the most basic orders, such as 'follow' or 'fuck'.

While having sex, it'll do whatever it wants with whatever perks you have enabled.

Standard pets can understand basic orders and will do what you tell them to during sex.

contains.title: Smart
contains.description:
Smart pets are capable of understanding and performing complicated orders.

At this stage they can do menial chores and leam new things easily. They can even read.

contains.title: Sapient
contains.description:
A pet that can truly think for itself. It's still biologically programmed to serve you without fail.

Its mental capabilities are similar to a humans. You can decide how far along its mental development is.

contains.title: Body Type
contains.description:
Now you need to decide what type of body your pet has. This only determines its general shape, the specific details are up to you.
Your pet can generate tentacles from any part of its body, regardless of which type you pick.
Choose one option.

contains.title: Blob
contains.description:
A popular choice, the Blob body is soft, cute, and maelleable.

If you ever wanted a bean bag chair that molests you then this is the body type for you.

Mammal, avian, reptilian, even aquatic creatures are all valid choices.

Your pet will be some kind of insect, maybe a worm, spider, or ant.

Might creep out some customers. But honestly they're kinda cute.

contains.title: Human
contains.description:
Another popular choice, we can make your pet look like a vety attractive human. We can make them look perfectly human, or give them unique traits.

contains.title: Suit

Each body can be given a different appearance.

Okay we can't actually make a robot, we deal in genetics not circuitry.

Medium Pay

Some people aren't ready for the committment of a pet. But they'll gladly pay for a night with one.

You can 'rent' your pet to clients of your choosing. You'll be payed more if you participate as well.

contains.title: Milk Donor
contains.description:
High Pay

Some pets require physical diets. You can help by stopping by our labs and feeding them.

Your breasts and penis will be temporarily enlarged, and your liquid productions increased.

The milking will be done manually by tentacle pets.

contains.title: Breeder
contains.description:
Very High Pay

Tentacle Pets are in high demand and we could always use more.

If you're willing to breed with your pet, we'll pay you for every offspring you send us.

We do not accept drones.
